name: places/ChIJQ7RcYyhZwokR_D5FyIAkjEk
adrFormatAddress: 323 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: I live around the block so when this place opened up I was ecstatic. I finally was able to drop off some of my dry cleaning and for having a 2 day turn around for dry cleaning mine was ready the following night. I love that they text you when your order is ready for pick up and that my receipt was sent to me as soon as I had dropped off my clothes. The staff is super helpful and all smiles. Will definitely be returning.

text.text: I live around the block so when this place opened up I was ecstatic. I finally was able to drop off some of my dry cleaning and for having a 2 day turn around for dry cleaning mine was ready the following night. originalText.text:
We dropped off our laundry and were told that it will be ready on Tuesday, because Monday was a public holiday. And the lady also said they can drop off at the hotel free of charge so we said yes. Called on Tuesday to find out the time and the guys said it will be arriving in the afternoon. Called again and a different girl said it will be at the hotel before 7pm. Received a SMS said laundry is coming at 6.30pm and another one at 7.30pm saying it won't be arriving on Tuesday. Tried to call the shop but they're already closed! Called on Wednesday morning and the lady who answered the phone after I explained to her what happened said she didn't work on Sunday and Tuesday so she didn't know what was going on. Also the laundry was not there, still hasn't come back from the outsource.
We understand that they're new but this is too unprofessional and incompetent.
I dropped off another load of clothes at Elegant wash and fold on Tuesday and paid half of what they changed here and received the clothes the next day delivered to the hotel without having to call and chased it up for multiple days.

originalText.text: BEST WASH AND FOLD  in the neighborhood. Dry cleaning was fast , wash and fold was ready same day and the worker made it a easy and fast process .

text.text: BEST WASH AND FOLD  in the neighborhood. Dry cleaning was fast , wash and fold was ready same day and the worker made it a easy and fast process .

originalText.text: I'm glad that a wash and fold opened close to my apartment. I wasn't happy with the previous one that I used, but never had a problem here and the staff is very friendly

originalText.text: Very quick and professional. Easy text updates and card technology ensures efficient pickups/drop offs. Will be coming back to drop off clothes for dry cleaning again!
